roleset.name: jump backwards heels over head

role.descr: Agent of motion (animate entity in motion)
thing in motion, if in addition to arg0

example.name: arg0, GOL
example.text: He backflips into a desktop computer terminal , which explodes , covering Huntz Hall 's face with microchips .
example.arg: into a desktop computer terminal , which explodes , covering Huntz Hall 's face with microchips

example.name: All args
example.text: Petr Pilat, aerobatic motorbike rider from the Czech Republic, backflipped his bike over a plane flown by Kirby Chambliss, Red Bull champion pilot from Texas.
example.arg: Petr Pilat, aerobatic motorbike rider from the Czech Republic,
over a plane flown by Kirby Chambliss, Red Bull champion pilot from Texas.

example.name: Args 0, 1, PRD and GOL
example.text: LMAO dude backflipped his damn pants off into a wall.

roleset.note: BACKFLIP-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on Newswire. No VNcls. (from backflip.01-v)
All arg1s I've found are inanimate, which is my motivation for keeping all animate entities in motion as arg0. (from backflip.01-v)
